home.title: Full Service Freight Dispatch & Consulting
home.description: LIGHT FREIGHT is your full-service dispatch and consulting firm, offering dispatching, driving, brokering, factoring, company setup, and much more for trucking companies.
home.keywords: freight dispatch, trucking consulting, freight factoring, company setup, truck dispatch, logistics, brokering

services.title: Comprehensive Trucking Services for Your Business
services.description: Discover LIGHT FREIGHT's complete range of trucking services: CDL dispatching, factoring, company setup, and business financing to optimize your operations.
services.keywords: trucking services, CDL dispatch, freight factoring, company formation, business financing, trucking solutions

tracking_authority.title: Simplify Your Trucking Authority & Permits
tracking_authority.description: Get your trucking authority and state permits with LIGHT FREIGHT's 7-step process. We handle MC, DOT, BOC-3, UCR, and state-specific permit applications.
tracking_authority.keywords: trucking authority, DOT number, MC number, BOC-3, UCR, state permits, trucking compliance

text.firm_description_title: WE ARE A FULL SERVICE TRUCKING - DISPATCH AND CONSULTING FIRM
text.firm_description_text: When it comes to transportation, we’ve done it all — dispatching, driving, brokering, working with shippers, factoring, fuel card programs, compliance, setting up authorities, launching companies, designing truck decals — you name it.
text.difference_1_title: Trust more, stress less with dedicated expertise.
text.difference_1_desc: Our logistics expertise runs deep. We offer tailored solutions for your business.
text.difference_2_title: Flex up or flex down based on your needs.
text.difference_2_desc: We’ll help you find solutions for any type of freight or warehousing need — project based, contract based, on demand.
text.difference_3_title: Power your business with purposeful tech.
text.difference_3_desc: Save time, streamline your transportation operations and find the best rates with the Beon Shipper platform.
text.full_truckload_section_text: Move your next shipment with confidence. From flatbed to dry-van, we have you covered.
text.join_team_title: Start hauling with LIGHT FREIGHT team
text.join_team_text: Whether you’re a new authority or had your authority for over 12 month, you can move the world forward with LIGHT FREIGHT.
text.start_trucking_company: Start Your Trucking Company With Us
text.start_trucking_company_desc: Launching your business can be confusing and time-consuming. We simplify the process so you can focus on getting on the road. Let us guide you every step of the way.
text.roadmap_desc: Follow our proven process to get your trucking authority quickly and correctly.
text.state_permits_desc: We also handle specific state-level permits to keep you compliant everywhere you go.
text.timeline_step_1_desc: The first step is deciding your business structure: Sole Proprietor, LLC, Partnership, or Corporation. We always recommend consulting with your accountant or attorney. Light Freight can assist you with filing your paperwork with the state and getting your company officially registered.
text.timeline_step_2_desc: Next, you’ll need an Employer Identification Number (EIN). Depending on your business setup, you may use your Social Security Number or opt for an EIN for tax purposes. Light Freight can help file your EIN with the IRS and ensure everything is in place.
text.timeline_step_3_desc: To get your USDOT Number, you’ll need to file the MCS-150 form — your official registration with the FMCSA. This form must be updated every two years to stay compliant. Let Light Freight handle it for you.
text.timeline_step_4_desc: Before you can haul loads across state lines, you’ll need an MC Number (Motor Carrier Authority). This process involves more than just the MCS-150 form — and Light Freight can help you save time, avoid mistakes, and handle all the paperwork accurately.
text.timeline_step_5_desc: All for-hire motor carriers, freight brokers, and freight forwarders must file a BOC-3 with the FMCSA. This form assigns a process agent in each state who can receive legal documents on your behalf. Light Freight ensures this form is filed correctly and on time.
text.timeline_step_6_desc: Carriers are required to carry Liability and Cargo insurance. Light Freight recommends:
text.timeline_step_6_note: To avoid delays in activating your MC Number, we recommend securing your insurance around Week 2 or 3 after filing. Delaying beyond 60 days can result in dismissal of your application.
text.timeline_step_7_desc: Anyone operating commercial motor vehicles across state lines must register with the UCR program. This includes motor carriers, brokers, freight forwarders, and leasing companies. Light Freight can coordinate your UCR filing quickly and easily.
text.permit_kyu_desc: Required if your vehicle (combined with trailer and load) exceeds 59,999 lbs while traveling in Kentucky. Quarterly reports must be filed with the state.
text.permit_ny_hut_desc: If you operate vehicles with a GVW of 18,001 lbs or more in New York State, you must obtain a Highway Use Tax (HUT) permit. Quarterly taxes are based on miles driven and vehicle weight.
text.permit_nm_wd_desc: Carriers operating in New Mexico with vehicles 26,001 lbs or more must secure a Weight Distance Permit. Quarterly taxes apply based on mileage and weight, and annual renewal is required.
text.our_services_title: Comprehensive Services for Your Trucking Business
text.our_services_desc: From dispatching to financing, we provide end-to-end solutions to support your growth and streamline your operations.
text.cdl_dispatching_desc: At LIGHT FREIGHT, we take pride in delivering top-tier tractor dispatching services. Count on our team to be professional, prompt, and efficient — ensuring your satisfaction every mile of the way.
text.factoring_services_desc: Factoring made simple. Get paid as soon as same day on your loads. Enjoy hassle-free cash flow with no hidden fees or long-term commitments.
text.factoring_detail_no_startup_fees: No startup or sign up fees
text.factoring_detail_simple_agreement: Simple two-page agreement with No Long Term Contracts
text.factoring_detail_dedicated_manager: Dedicated account manager to handle all invoicing, billing, and collections
text.factoring_detail_fund_copies: Fund with scanned/faxed copies - no originals unless required by the brokerage
text.authority_setup_desc: Light Freight is your trusted partner to help get your new trucking company started on the right foot from day 1. We will file all state and federal paperwork to start your company and trucking authority right the first time.
text.business_financing_desc: Light Freight Dispatch is your first stop for business financing. We have all types of options, good credit or bad credit, to help you secure the capital you need for growth.
